section.title: SYSTEM::SUBSYSTEMS::RENDER::SIMPLE::CHAR Struct Reference

para.para: represents a 16X8 hardcode char for a simple font used in the early stages of initialization of the kernel

listitem.para: the actual width of the char. can be used to improve spacing between characters
the actual height of the char. can be used to improve spacing between characters
bitmap of the char. max char size is 16X8
